title: Ethereum 2.0 Security Considerations
description: Ethereum 2.0 is fast approaching with multiple implementations underway. We examine the attack surface of Eth2, specifically:   -Networking (eclipse attacks, transport encryption, discovery protocol, anonymity)   -Software vulnerabilities (DoS, code integrity, inconsistent state transitions) -Consensus assumptions (honest majority, liveness) -Efforts underway (fuzzing, code review, external assessments)
